channel.title: Lock this please admin or mod problem solved
channel.description:
[u][b]Hello i'm Thunder and i was just wondering how to run a client, whenever i click run.bat an error will pop up and i will have to click any key to continue then it will go away and the client won't pop up. Do i need like a version of Java to run this? Or is this my computer.
Please help me with this! :D :D :D
Please lock mod or admin problem solved =][/b][/u]

item.title: Lock this please admin or mod problem solved

item.description:
@Mod_Thunder wrote:

Thanks i’ll try this[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 12, 2008, 04:03:05 pm[/size][hr]DUDE IT WORKED THANK YOU VERY MUCH!!

item.title: Lock this please admin or mod problem solved
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Donkie Owner Donkie
item.description:
@Owner_Donkie wrote:

Client or server…? If it’s a client go to the run.bat and press edit and it should open with a notepad…replace it with this, @echo off
title Client
java -Xmx500m -cp . EGUI
pause

Get back to me if it works or not…

Read full topic
